PAD_IdentifiedGrave.synopsis: Player comes across some old, rushed graves for the war dead from a hundred years ago. They comment depending on how much they're aware of previous events in the region, Jaheira and Halsin, as veterans of this very fight, know the full context.

PAD_IdentifiedGrave_0.speaker: Player
PAD_IdentifiedGrave_0.text: Some of our war dead, from so long ago. Buried in haste when we had to flee the curse.
PAD_IdentifiedGrave_0.context: NodeContext: Solemn, Spotting some old makeshift graves.

PAD_IdentifiedGrave_1.speaker: Player
PAD_IdentifiedGrave_1.text: Makeshift Selûnite graves. They were buried with haste.

PAD_IdentifiedGrave_2.speaker: Player
PAD_IdentifiedGrave_2.text: Makeshift Selûnite graves. They must have fallen in the fight against the Sharrans, all that time ago.

PAD_IdentifiedGrave_3.speaker: Player
PAD_IdentifiedGrave_3.text: Graves. Someone had to bury their dead in a hurry.
